mapper.update: update iov_administrative_division set pid = #{pid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, deep = #{deep,jdbcType=INTEGER}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, local_name = #{localName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pinyin_prefix = #{pinyinPrefix,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pinyin = #{pinyin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ext_id = #{extId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ext_name = #{extName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, delete_status = #{deleteStatus,jdbcType=BIT} where ad_id = #{adId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select ad_id, pid, deep, name, local_name, pinyin_prefix, pinyin, ext_id, ext_name, create_time, modify_time, delete_status from iov_administrative_division where ad_id = #{adId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select ad_id, pid, deep, name, local_name, pinyin_prefix, pinyin, ext_id, ext_name, create_time, modify_time, delete_status from iov_administrative_division
